content.title: Image RIT Autonomous Drone Challenge
content.text: My team trained a Haar Classifier to get a Parrot AR Drone to recognize character's from the Jetsons. It used a combination of Node.js and OpenCV.

content.title: RIT Gobblet AI Tournament
content.text: My team developed a java program that would play the board game Gobblet. It went on to come in 2nd place in the CS department AI tournament.
